thread.title: Cops seek 4 men who beat, slashed victim's, 22, face in Brooklyn
thread.title_full: Cops seek 4 men who beat, slashed victim's, 22, face in Brooklyn

author: LAURA DIMON
title: Cops seek 4 men who beat, slashed victim's, 22, face in Brooklyn
text:
Cops seek four men who beat, slashed 22-year-old victim in face during Brooklyn attack Cops seek 4 men who beat, slashed victim's, 22, face in Brooklyn NEW YORK DAILY NEWS Friday, February 10, 2017, 11:15 PM 
Police are looking for four toughs who punched and slashed a man in Brooklyn, police said Friday. 
The violent foursome started following the 22-year-old victim on Crescent St. near Glen St. in Cypress Hills around 6:30 p.m. on Wednesday, police said. 
They asked him if he was a gang member and when he didn't answer, they punched him in the face and sliced his left cheek with a box cutter, authorities said. 
Medics took the victim to Brookdale University Hospital to be treated for his injuries, officials said. His attackers remain at large. 
Police ask anyone with information to call Crime Stoppers at (800) 577-TIPS. Join the Conversation:
